meanings.definition: A type of bird native to New Caledonia.
meanings.sent1: The colorful kagus flew gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of kagus near the forest.
meanings.sent3: The kagus decided to have a singing competition.
meanings.sent4: Her dance was as elegant as a kagus in flight.
meanings.sent5: The kagus's call echoed through the valley.

meanings.sent1: There are many kagus in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The kagus were spotted in the national park.
meanings.sent3: The children were excited to see the kagus up close.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with the beauty of kagus.
meanings.sent5: The kagus' feathers shimmered in the sunlight.
